00018 #ifndef REFINED_NEIGHBOR_INFO_H
00019 #define REFINED_NEIGHBOR_INFO_H

00023 struct refined_neighbor_pack
00024 {
00025   int orig_gen;  
00026 
00027   unsigned target_element[KEYLENGTH];
00028   unsigned old_neighbor[KEYLENGTH];
00029   unsigned sons[2][KEYLENGTH]; /*only those sons which are at that side*/
00030 
00031 };
00032 
00033 struct refined_neighbor
00034 {
00035   int target_proc;
00036   int orig_gen;
00037 
00038   unsigned target_element[KEYLENGTH];
00039   unsigned old_neighbor[KEYLENGTH];
00040   unsigned sons[2][KEYLENGTH]; /*only those sons which are at that side*/
00041   
00042   refined_neighbor* next;
00043 
00044   refined_neighbor(){next=NULL;};
00045 
00046   void set_parameters(int proc, unsigned* target, unsigned* old, unsigned* new_sons, int* which, int og, int case_flag)
00047     {
00048       target_proc=proc;
00049       orig_gen=og;
00050  
00051       for(int i=0; i<KEYLENGTH; i++)
00052         {
00053           target_element[i]=*(target+i);
00054           old_neighbor[i]=*(old+i);
00055 
00056           if(case_flag==1)
00057             {
00058               sons[0][i]=*(new_sons+(*(which+1)*KEYLENGTH+i));
00059               sons[1][i]=*(new_sons+(*which*KEYLENGTH+i));
00060             }
00061           else if(case_flag==2)
00062             {
00063               sons[0][i]=*(new_sons+((*(which))*KEYLENGTH+i));
00064               sons[1][i]=0;
00065             }
00066         }
00067       next=NULL;
00068     };
00069   
00070 
00071 };
00072 
00073 #endif
